English:
Yes. I'm certain that these wicked traps could
only have been set by Crusadermon.
Chinese:
嗯……的確，這種惡劣的陷阱
一定是劍皇獸設下的。
Korean:
예… 확실히, 이 악질적인 트랩은
로드나이트몬이 설치한 게 틀림 없는 것 같네요
German:
Ja. Ich bin mir sicher, dass nur Crusadermon
diese fiesen Fallen gelegt haben kann.

English: Probably in order to buy time.
German: Damit will sie vermutlich Zeit schinden.

English:
They're underhanded as well as malicious.
Miss Rie's personality seems to be showing 
through.
Chinese:
不但是權宜之計，而且心眼還很壞……
似乎顯露出里繪姊的性格。
Korean:
고식적인 데다가, 심보도 나빠요
…리에 씨의 성격이 드러나 있는 것 같네요
German:
Sie sind heimtückisch und gemein.
Wohl ein Spiegel von Fräulein Ries Persönlichkeit.
Was gibt’s denn da zu lachen?

English:
You aren't far behind in the personality game!
I finally got a glimpse of the real you!
That's it! I'll call you Yuuko the Blackhearted!
Chinese:
要說性格有多差的話，悠子也不會輸的！
我好高興悠子讓我看到妳的“真面目”！
決定了！就命名為「黑悠子」吧！
Korean:
성격이 그런 건 유코도 지지 않아!
유코가 "진짜 얼굴"을 보여 줘서 기뻐!
정했어! 그 모습을「검은 유코」라고 부르겠어!
German:
So ganz ohne bist du aber auch nicht!
Na endlich sehe ich die echte Yuuko!
Ab jetzt nenne ich dich Yuuko Finsterherz!
